snippet: The microraptor was four feet long and weighed about nine pounds — by far the largest such dinosaur that lived about 125 million years ago.
abstract: Study in journal Nature Communications reports discovery of flying, four-winged dinosaur, known as Changyuraptor, in northeastern China.
lead_paragraph: The microraptor was four feet long and weighed about nine pounds — by far the largest such dinosaur that lived about 125 million years ago.

headline.main: Changyuraptor, Large Species of Flying Dinosaur, Is Discovered

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County
